article.title: EFW Provides Helmet Display Tracker Systems
article.text: EFW Inc., Fort Worth, Texas, is being awarded an $11,666,579 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract (N00019-13-C-0037) to exercise an option for the installation and procurement of helmet display tracker system (HDTS) kits for AH-1W aircraft, including nine HTDS P-kits, 29 AH-1W Helmet kits, and installation of 54 HDTS.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
